text:
(1)
Cannon Street, west side, north from but not including Grand to Delancey Streets.
April 11, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
A more complete view, showing both sides of Cannon Street with the Williamsburg Bridge arching same at Delancey Street. The 4-story corner building shown in the foreground is No. 540 Grand Street.
March 23, 1937.

P. L. Sperr.

(1)
Cannon Street, west side, north from but not including Grand to Delancey Streets.
April 11, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
A more complete view, showing both sides of Cannon Street with the Williamsburg Bridge arching same at Delancey Street. The 4-story corner building shown in the foreground is No. 540 Grand Street.
March 23, 1937.

P. L. Sperr.

(1)
Grand Street, north side, west from but not including Cannon Street. The view shows 522-530 Grand Street, at, adjoining and east of the N.E. corner of Columbia Street, which are 4 and 2-story frame houses, respectively with brick fronts.

April 4, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, showing a closer view of the main entrance to the R. Hoe and Company Plant, on Grand Street, north side, between Sheriff and Columbia Streets.

April 1, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

(1)
Grand Street, north side, west from but not including Cannon Street. The view shows 522-530 Grand Street, at, adjoining and east of the N.E. corner of Columbia Street, which are 4 and 2-story frame houses, respectively with brick fronts.

April 4, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, showing a closer view of the main entrance to the R. Hoe and Company Plant, on Grand Street, north side, between Sheriff and Columbia Streets.

April 1, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

Jackson Street, west side, at the South east corner of Henry Street and point of intersection with Grand Avenue, looking northwards.

April 25th, 1939.

P.L. Sperr,
